vsParam:
Marjoram Sensei, are you there?
We just passed by the bulletin board...

And it says "It's bad, your sensei is in trouble".
What's going on?

Ah, it's you! Here's the thing, I'm drafting the curriculum plan
for wizardology students...

But I'm running out of paper.
I thought I had enough paper supplies for a whole year...

So I want you to prepare for me as much paper as possible.
Will you do that for me?
It sounds heavy... But I'll do what I can!

Ha-ha. It will be pretty heavy if you want lots of paper.
It will be hard to transport it here... Er! Let's do our best!

I'm glad nothing too bad happened to you!
But since Sensei is in trouble, of course we'll help!

Thank you!
You are very reliable, [px]!
But, why do you need so much paper?

I'm going to make every student
a customized curriculum plan.

I wrote down all necessary things only to find
I'm low on paper.

That's... our Marjoram Sensei.
Always so meticulously with the students...

As a sensei, this is the least I can do.
And I'm doing it for my kawaii students!

I see... In this case,
we need to prepare lots of paper, [px]!

This should be enough!
Marjoram Sensei, we brought you paper... Um.
Uh—!? What's with these piles of paper mountains!?

Oh... Thank you so much!
I just used up all my paper. You are right on time.

Yes, it's the customized curriculum plan I told you about.
This is a set for one student.
So much for only one student?
Uh... Can I take a look?

Huh, is it strange?
You can look at it if you want.
That's a yearly plan by day. Down to every detail!

That's... so much... Are you going to make one
for every wizardology student?

You are really a big help this time,
[px]!

Alright, this kid's plan is done!
I shall start the next.

Hey, [px].
I don't think Marjoram Sensei realized...

Making plans for everyone...
I don't think we prepared enough paper for her.
With so much paper, I don't have to worry anymore ♪
